UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design, structural and functional characterization of a Temporin-1b analog active against Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Avitabile C, Netti F, Orefice G, Palmieri M, Nocerino N, Malgieri G, D'Andrea LD, Capparelli R, Fattorusso R, Romanelli A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus A170(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=10µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(no activity data),Escherichia coli(no activity data)
